message: Zanima me, koliko bi bil danes vreden TRONov laptop ARIMA W622-DK8X (kupljen 2006), deluje brezhibno. hvala za pomoč. tukaj pa podatki:  - procesor:  1,80 gigahertz AMD Turion 64 512 kilobyte primary memory cache 64-bit ready Not hyper-threaded.  - FUJITSU MHV2080AH [Hard drive] (80,03 GB)  - matična plošča: Board: ARIMA W622DK8X Rev1.791D0F04 Bus Clock: 200 megahertz BIOS: Phoenix 791D0F04 08/25/2005  - ram: 1024 Megabytes Usable Installed Memory  -ATI MOBILITY RADEON X700 [Display adapter] Toshiba 15,4 [Monitor] (15,4"vis, s/n 16843009, januar 2006)
